mapper.sql: id, title, create_time, modify_time, path, examine_state, attachment_id, state
mapper.insert: insert into us_video (id, title, create_time, modify_time, path, examine_state, attachment_id, state) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examineState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into us_video
id,
title,
create_time,
modify_time,
path,
examine_state,
attachment_id,
state,

mapper.update:
update us_video
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
examine_state = #{examineState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment_id = #{attachmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update us_video set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, examine_state = #{examineState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_id = #{attachmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select video.id, video.title, video.create_time, video.path, video.state from us_video video left join us_course_video ucv on ucv.video_id = video.id inner join us_course course on ucv.course_id = course.id where ucv.course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
